com.hamweather.aeris.communication

Class UrlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hamweather.aeris.communication.UrlBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AerisRequest, LocationRequestUrlBuilder

    public abstract class UrlBuilder
extends Object
    Abstract UrlBuilder that takes care of some handling for each builder.
